meanings.definition: Remove hair from (a part of the body) by mechanical or chemical means.
meanings.sent1: She epilated her legs before going to the beach.
meanings.sent2: It is common to epilate the underarms for longer-lasting smoothness.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally epilated its tail on a sticky surface.
meanings.sent4: The gardener epilated the weeds from the flower bed with precision.
meanings.sent5: Epilating the unwanted hair made her feel more confident in her appearance.

meanings.definition: Having had hair removed from (a part of the body).
meanings.sent1: Her epilated skin felt smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The epilated area looked clean and hair-free.
meanings.sent3: The epilated dog seemed to enjoy the attention it received.
meanings.sent4: The epilated surface gleamed in the sunlight like polished marble.
meanings.sent5: After being epilated, her skin felt refreshed and rejuvenated.
